name: Chaotic BattleDrome Simulator
description:
Chaotic BattleDrome Simulator that can be played with mouse controls or VR physics controls. 

Disclaimer:

This is a non-profit fan-made project based on the Chaotic Cartoon / TCG. 

I do not own any of the music, images, or any of the properties associated with Chaotic. 

Chaotic is owned by Chaotic USA & LDG.

Please support the official release.
